channel.description:
hello im sorta in need of a gui port changer i dont want a shitty one like bluurs somthing that when u click on world 1 it will set port 2 43594 and if you click world 2 it will change it 2 5555 rep++ if you can get this for me! thanks
~matt353 :)

item.title: In need of
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Seriously, it’s not that hard to find one, let alone make one…

Here’s a quick gist:

JMenuItem changePort = new JMenuItem("Change Server Port");
menuBar.add(changePort);
changePort.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
        String source = event.getActionCommand();
        if(source.equals("Change Server Port")) {
            initPortScreen();
        }
    }
});

/* ... */
public void initPortScreen() {
    JFrame frame = new JFrame("Change Server Port");
    JPanel panel = new JPanel(new GridBagLayout(1, 2));
    JTextfield portText = new JTextField();
    JButton save = new JButton("Save");
    save.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
            String source = event.getActionCommand();
            if(source.equals("Save")) {
                client.portVarible = Integer.parseInt(portText.getText());//Adjust as necessary
            }
        }
    });
    frame.setVisible(true);
}

Simple.

Read full topic
